trans-unit.source: Represents information related to the scope of data provided by an input method.
trans-unit.target: 表示輸入的方法所提供的資料範圍的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope%2A> properties to get an InputScope for a particular element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope%2A>屬性來取得特定項目的 InputScope。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input scope name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定輸入的範圍名稱。

trans-unit.source: Using an input scope name is the simplest way to refer to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope> for an element.
trans-unit.target: 使用輸入的領域的名稱是最簡單的方式來參考<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope>的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope>

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName"></xref> enumeration specifying a name for this input scope.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName"></xref>指定名稱，這個輸入範圍的列舉。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScopeNameValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScopeNameValue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to any value other than a valid member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設定為有效的成員以外的任何值時引發<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of phrases to be used as suggested input patterns by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 取得片語以作為輸入處理器所建議的輸入模式的集合。

trans-unit.source: An object containing a collection of phrases to be used as suggested input patterns by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含片語以作為輸入處理器所建議的輸入模式的集合。

trans-unit.source: This object implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression to be used as a suggested text input pattern by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要做為建議的文字輸入模式的輸入處理器的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines a regular expression to be used as a suggested text input pattern by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 字串，定義規則運算式，當做輸入處理器依據建議的文字輸入的模式。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設定為時引發**null**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies any Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) markup to be used as a suggested input pattern by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定要做為建議的輸入模式的輸入處理器任何語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 標記。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is only applicable to speech input.
trans-unit.target: 目前，這個屬性只適用於語音輸入。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies any SRGS markup to be used as a suggested input pattern by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定所有 SRGS 標記做輸入處理器所建議的輸入模式。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設定為時引發**null**。
